attributes.mlflow.spanInputs: {"prompt": "Create Cisco IOS XR 7.0.1 telemetry model-driven configuration to monitor NetFlow/flow monitor operational statistics (exporter, cache, drops). Use gRPC with no TLS. Telemetry server 192.0.2.115 port 57500. Choose relevant sensor-paths."}
attributes.mlflow.spanOutputs:
"telemetry model-driven
 sensor-group NETFLOW-OPER-STATS
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-telemetry-model-driven-oper:telemetry-model-driven
  sensor-path Cisco-IOS-XR-telemetry-model-driven-oper:telemetry-model-driven/destinations
 !
 destination-group DG-GRPC
  address-family ipv4
   destination 192.0.2.115
    port 57500
    encoding self-describing-gpb
    protocol grpc no-tls
 !
 subscription SUB-NETFLOW-OPER-STATS
  sensor-group-id NETFLOW-OPER-STATS sample-interval 30000
  destination-group-id DG-GRPC
 !"
